thread.title: BRIEF-Amarin Corporation Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.08

title: BRIEF-Amarin Corporation Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.08
text:
May 2, 2018 / 9:40 AM / Updated 32 minutes ago BRIEF-Amarin Corporation Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.08 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Amarin Corporation PLC:
* REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES UPDATE ON OPERATIONS
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.08
* CORPORATION PLC - REDUCE-IT STUDY ON-TRACK FOR REPORTING TOP-LINE RESULTS BY END OF Q3 2018
* CORPORATION- NET PRODUCT REVENUE FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 AND 2017 WAS $43.8 MILLION AND $34.3 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
